name: Overthrowing the Network State with Coordi-Nations
description:
TECHNICAL

9:30 - 11:00  Reporting on the technical specifications necessary to ensure the proper operations of a Coordi-Nation: Technical requirements for sovereign communities

11:00 - 12:30 Fishbowl: What does blockchain technology bring that is new?

14:00 - 17:00 Roundtables:

  1. State of the Art and technological gaps to be filled
  2. Blockchain as a means to support new sovereignties: challenges and opportunities
